Description: Steatite shabti of Nbt pr Šps Wğ3-rn:s with a lappet-wig, a modelled face and parallel hands in relief holding two relief hoes and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in seven rows of incised Hieroglyphs; the foot is incomplete.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
